001package io.jstach.ezkv.kvs;
002
003import org.jspecify.annotations.Nullable;
004
005/**
006 * An exception that indicates an error occurred while trying to interpret key values from
007 * a resource. This could be because of an interpolation issue or incorrect
008 * {@link KeyValuesResource} resource key.
009 *
010 * @apiNote Because it is largely unclear how an application should recover from various
011 * resource key syntax this runtime exception is rather opaque.
012 */
013public abstract sealed class KeyValuesException extends RuntimeException
014                permits KeyValuesMediaException, io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.interpolate.Interpolator.InterpolationException,
015                KeyValuesResourceParserException, KeyValuesResourceNameException {
016
017        private static final long serialVersionUID = 6345926490272278304L;
018
019        KeyValuesException(@Nullable String message, @Nullable Throwable cause) {
020                super(message, cause);
021        }
022
023        /**
024         * Overridden for specific key values exceptions.
025         * @param message error message
026         */
027        protected KeyValuesException(String message) {
028                super(message);
029        }
030
031        KeyValuesException(Throwable cause) {
032                super(cause);
033        }
034
035}
036
037final class KeyValuesResourceNameException extends KeyValuesException {
038
039        private static final long serialVersionUID = 3181821413475470665L;
040
041        KeyValuesResourceNameException(String message) {
042                super(message);
043        }
044
045}
